3e037a8b-a84d-489d-84a3-15610a45e85f.description: Earners of the OneTrust Certified Privacy Professional badge understand best practices to effectively establish and maintain privacy, security, and governance programs using OneTrust technology and tools. Course participants have a strong working knowledge of OneTrust’s core modules, including Assessment Automation, Data Subject Requests, Vendor Management, Data Mapping, Cookies, Consent, and Incident Management, and also understand privacy laws, including the GDPR, CCPA, and LGPD.
3e037a8b-a84d-489d-84a3-15610a45e85f.name: OneTrust Certified Privacy Professional

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a two-part course covering data privacy best practices while also exploring the OneTrust suite of modules.
Successfully pass a 90-minute, online exam.

29a1f9ec-9fb5-4ec8-b2e8-01767d5a4070.description: Earners of the OneTrust Certified GRC Professional badge have mastered a deep understanding of all OneTrust GRC solutions. They have demonstrated a high-level knowledge of the Enterprise Policy Management, IT Risk Management, and Audit Management, including risk frameworks, controls, and how to manage the lifecycle of risks.
29a1f9ec-9fb5-4ec8-b2e8-01767d5a4070.name: OneTrust Certified GRC Professional

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a six-hour course on GRC best practices while also exploring the OneTrust suite of GRC modules.
Successfully pass an online exam.

78e196ae-f653-4fef-bae5-fa264617526b.description: Earners of the OneTrust Third-Party Risk Management Expert badge have a deep understanding of the third-party risk lifecycle. They are competent in the best ways to utilize the OneTrust Third-Party Risk Management and Third-Party Risk Exchange modules to automate the most critical vendor security, privacy, and compliance tasks. Certification earners have a strong working knowledge of vendor risk flagging and automation while consistently demonstrating vendor management practices.
78e196ae-f653-4fef-bae5-fa264617526b.name: OneTrust Third-Party Risk Management Expert

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a half-day course.
Successfully pass an online exam.
Designed for Procurement and Third-Party Management professionals who have 6+ months of experience using the OneTrust tool.
Recommended for those who have previously completed the OneTrust Professional Certification course and want to expand their knowledge of Third-Party Risk Management.

b1f98e16-84a7-4c0b-a65b-8fc4c0837c58.description: Earners of this badge are IT management and privacy professionals who have demonstrated a strong understanding of the core tenets of Data Mapping Automation within the OneTrust platform. They have mastered various data management topics, including advanced risk flagging, best practices for automation and asset/process management, and advanced reporting and dashboards.
b1f98e16-84a7-4c0b-a65b-8fc4c0837c58.name: OneTrust Data Mapping Automation Expert

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a half-day course.
Successfully pass an online exam.
Designed for IT Administrators and Privacy Professionals who have already configured their systems and processing database within OneTrust.
Recommended for those who have previously completed the OneTrust Professional Certification course and want to expand their knowledge of Data Mapping Automation.

aace008e-9b12-4e60-9e91-c0ddbe604e8a.description: Earners of the OneTrust Privacy Rights Automation Expert badge understand how to improve their organization's Privacy Rights Request programs. They have developed advanced skills around form design and request fulfillment. Earners of this badge know how to effectively use dynamic forms and understand the best practices for ID validation and reporting.
aace008e-9b12-4e60-9e91-c0ddbe604e8a.name: OneTrust Privacy Rights Automation Expert

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a half-day course.
Successfully pass an online exam.

Ideal for Privacy Rights Requests Managers and Administrators who have built webforms in the tool and have a strong understanding of core Privacy Rights Automation functionality. A strong understanding of core Privacy Rights Automation functionality is recommended.
Recommended for those who have previously completed the OneTrust Professional Certification course and want to expand their knowledge of Privacy Rights.

8281d4cb-d1ad-4b4d-bb6e-07d477add988.description: Earners of the OneTrust PIA & DPIA Automation Expert badge understand how to use integration and API skills to create a robust PIA, DPIA, and overall privacy assessment environment. They have designed advanced assessment templates and built administrator settings to develop effective risk flagging and management protocols.
8281d4cb-d1ad-4b4d-bb6e-07d477add988.name: OneTrust PIA & DPIA Automation Expert

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a half-day course.
Successfully pass an online exam.
Designed for PIA & DPIA Automation Administrators and Privacy Professionals with 6+ months of experience in the OneTrust tool.
Recommended for those who have previously completed the OneTrust Professional Certification course and want to expand their knowledge of PIA & DPIA Automation.

89963fb0-ddb1-41ef-89d6-9cfbb31e552f.description: Earners of the OneTrust Incident Management Expert certification have learned how to design the OneTrust Incident Management tool to keep track of outstanding incidents, set up a dynamic workflow and routing rules. They have an advanced understanding of best utilizing the OneTrust platform features to improve incident response processes and reporting.
89963fb0-ddb1-41ef-89d6-9cfbb31e552f.name: OneTrust Incident Management Expert

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a half-day course.
Successfully pass an online exam.
Designed for security professionals who have previous experience within the OneTrust tool and familiarity with the Incident Management module.
Recommended for those who have previously completed the OneTrust Professional Certification course and want to expand their knowledge of Incident Response Management.

0c575036-26f0-40bc-82ba-711a6846a113.description: Earners of the Cookie Consent Expert badge have demonstrated working knowledge of the advanced and new features within the OneTrust Cookie Consent module. They have shown an in-depth understanding of best practices and methods to streamline organizational cookie consent processes.
0c575036-26f0-40bc-82ba-711a6846a113.name: OneTrust Cookie Consent Expert

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a half-day course.
Successfully pass an online exam.
Designed for attendees familiar with core concepts of the OneTrust cookie tool.
Recommended for those who have previously completed the OneTrust Professional Certification course and want to expand their knowledge of Cookie Consent.

c3ed5da5-06fd-45fe-9ec9-7d09303fd3b6.description: Earners of the OneTrust Consent & Preference Management Expert badge have demonstrated a deep understanding of the OneTrust Consent & Preference Management module. They have shown an understanding of the basic and advanced ways to configure and implement collection points throughout the OneTrust platform.
c3ed5da5-06fd-45fe-9ec9-7d09303fd3b6.name: OneTrust Consent & Preference Management Expert

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a half-day course.
Successfully pass an online exam.

Designed for marketers and IT team members in charge of setting up consent and collection points as well as developers. API experience and having Postman downloaded are requirements for participation in this course.
Recommended for those who have previously completed the OneTrust Professional Certification course and want to expand their knowledge of Consent & Preference Management.

b8316387-3358-40da-9ce2-4d0c84226403.description: OneTrust Fellows of Privacy Technology have earned all 10 OneTrust Expert Certifications and demonstrate continuous expertise in privacy operations, management, and protection. Fellows have an expansive working knowledge of privacy best practices, compliance, data discovery, and assessment automation. OneTrust Fellows have also demonstrated a deep understanding of privacy regulations and best practices with one year of privacy management experience or an IAPP CIPP.
b8316387-3358-40da-9ce2-4d0c84226403.name: OneTrust Fellow of Privacy Technology

badge_template_activities.title: Professionals must complete the OneTrust Certified Privacy Professional Course and all OneTrust Expert courses to qualify.
One year experience in privacy management, and/or an IAPP CIPP credential.

0df54d4e-ef73-4f49-9790-e6d45a87c214.description: Earners of the OneTrust Targeted Data Discovery Expert badge have the knowledge and skills to build out effective integrations between OneTrust’s Data Subject Request Module and various systems. They have demonstrated that they can implement effective, targeted data discovery programs in their workplace.
0df54d4e-ef73-4f49-9790-e6d45a87c214.name: OneTrust Targeted Data Discovery Expert

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a half-day course.
Successfully pass an online exam.
Recommended for those who have previously completed the OneTrust Professional Certification course and want to expand their knowledge of Targeted Data Discovery.
Recommended for those who have previously completed the OneTrust Professional Certification course and want to expand their knowledge of Targeted Data Discovery.

437e8823-22b0-417c-843a-68728c04bd40.description: Earners of the OneTrust Data Discovery Expert badge have developed a deep understanding of the OneTrust Data Discovery module. They are skilled in configuring integrations and using automation to categorize, classify, and correlate data. Badge earners understand how to process consumer and data subject requests for access, deletion, and more. This is designed for system administrators who have strong familiarity with OneTrust and experience with APIs and integration-related terminology.
437e8823-22b0-417c-843a-68728c04bd40.name: OneTrust OneTrust Data Discovery Expert

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a half-day course.
Successfully pass an online exam.
Designed for system administrators who have strong familiarity with OneTrust and experience with APIs and integration-related terminology.
Recommended for those who have previously completed the OneTrust Professional Certification course and want to expand their knowledge of Data Discovery.

bbaf76fb-11aa-4aaa-b574-e1da118b52bc.description: Earners of the OneTrust Certified ESG Professional badge have achieved an understanding ESG terminology, frameworks, metric groups, reports, and multiple other tools for both streamlining and centralizing data collection to assist in the prioritization, tracking, and creation of continued sustainability goals. Course participants have a strong working knowledge of how to implement and track their ESG programs within the OneTrust’s ESG Program Reporting & Disclosures module.
bbaf76fb-11aa-4aaa-b574-e1da118b52bc.name: OneTrust Certified ESG Professional

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a four-hour course on ESG best practices while also exploring the OneTrust ESG Program Reporting & Disclosures module.

b9e80a06-9094-4d5b-8641-d69933f3c857.description: Earners of the OneTrust Discovery Expert badge have developed a deep understanding of the OneTrust Discovery module. They are skilled in configuring integrations and using automation to categorize, classify, and correlate data. Badge earners understand how to process consumer and data subject requests for access, deletion, and more. This is designed for system administrators who have strong familiarity with OneTrust and experience with APIs and integration-related terminology.
b9e80a06-9094-4d5b-8641-d69933f3c857.name: Discovery Expert Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a half day course
Successfully pass an online exam.
Designed for system administrators who have strong familiarity with OneTrust and experience with APIs and integration-related terminology.
Recommended for those who have previously completed the OneTrust Professional Certification course and want to expand their knowledge of Data Discovery.
